name: SacCerML
description: A DecisionTree Classifier program aimed at genecalling from Saccharomyces cerevisiae (and other organisms)

name: distilgpt2-finetuned-microbiology
description: Small model for language modeling based on distilgpt2 and on microbiology-related text data

name: VirBiCla
description: A novel ML-based binary classifier to tell viral and non-viral long reads apart in metagenomic samples.
